description:
Responsive trail running shoes that promote a natural gait for running or long-distance hiking. Updates for the Lone Peak 7 includes a newly designed seamless upper and an upgraded MaxTrac™ outsole for extra traction on rugged trails. Ample room in the toe box allows your toes to spread and splay comfortably during your foot strike, and zero drop promotes a natural stride.

  • Quick-Dry Air Mesh upper with overlays and a toe cap for durability
  • 4-point gaiter trap helps to secure a range of trail-running gaiters
  • Altra EGO™ EVA midsole provides a responsive yet soft feel
  • MaxTrac™ rubber outsole features 4mm Trailclaw canted lugs for traction in rugged terrain
  • Balanced Cushioning™ Promotes better form and foot alignment while reducing impact
  • Footshape™ gives your feet more space allowing them to sit naturally
name: Altra Lone Peak 7 Trail Running Shoes - Men's
